name: hack-ideas
description: A MEAN stack app to manage and view Hackathon ideas in an organization

scripts.install-all: npm run install-server & npm run install-client & npm install
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run watch --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm test --prefix client

author: Eswar Prasad Kona
